info.description: This is the API documentation for idb application.
info.title: IDB API Documentation

get.description: Get custom crontab conf file list in work dir

post.description: Create a symlink in the crontab configuration directory to activate the specified configuration, or remove the symlink to deactivate it.

get.description: Get conf diff compare to specfied version
Get details of a conf file in form mode.
get.summary: Get conf file in form mode

parameters.description: Conf file name. If this parameter is left empty, return template data.
parameters.name: name

put.description: Save the details of a conf file in form mode. This will fully overwrite the original file content with the submitted data.
put.summary: Save conf file in form mode

post.description: Create a new conf file in form mode.
post.summary: Create conf file in form mode

get.description: Get histories of a conf file

post.description: Forcefully executes all commands defined in the specified crontab configuration for the given host and returns the execution result.
post.summary: Execute the specified crontab configuration for a host

get.description: Get content of a conf file

put.description: Save the content of a conf file
Restore conf file to specified version

post.description: Sync global repository to specified host
post.summary: Sync global repository to specified host

get.description: Connect to a compose log stream through SSE

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of config files to tail
parameters.name: config_files

put.description: Update docker conf file with content

parameters.description: Container state, one of (all created running paused restarting removing exited dead)
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Order by one of (name, state, created)
parameters.name: order_by

put.description: Update detail of the specified container

get.description: Get detail of the specified container
Connect to a container log stream through SSE

parameters.description: How many lines from the end of the logs to show, can be one of 100, 200, 500, 1000. If not specified, all logs will be shown.
parameters.name: tail

parameters.description: Show logs since a certain time, can be one of 24h, 4h, 1h, 10m. If not specified, all logs will be shown.
parameters.name: since

get.description: Get stats of the specified container
Create or reconnect to a container terminal session through websocket.
get.summary: Create or reconnect to a container terminal session through websocket

get.description: Get resource usage of the specified container
get.summary: Get resource usage of the specified container

get.description: Follow resource usage of the specified container
get.summary: Follow resource usage of the specified container

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of image names to delete
parameters.name: sources

get.description: Get details of a container, image, volume or network

parameters.description: Type of inspection, can be one of container, image, volume and network
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of volume ids to delete
parameters.name: sources

post.description: Prune operation for container, image, volume, network or buildcache

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of volume ids to delete
parameters.name: sources

get.description: Get list of files in a directory

post.description: Create a new file or directory

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of file paths to delete
parameters.name: sources

post.description: Compress multiple files or directories into an archive

Download a file from a specific host and path
Get the first few lines of a file's content

get.description: Get the size of a directory
Get the last few lines of a file's content
Connect to a file's content stream through SSE (Server-Sent Events)

post.description: Upload a file to a specific host and path

mem_total.description: 总可用 = 物理内存 - 内核占用

mem_used.description: 已使用 = 进程占用 + 缓冲区 + 缓存区

total.description: 总可用 = 物理内存 - 内核占用

used.description: 已使用 = 进程占用 + 缓冲区 + 缓存区

alias.description: 用于查找目录和证书项目的主体别名

alt_domains.description: 备用域名，以换行符分隔

alt_ips.description: 备用IP地址，以换行符分隔

expire_unit.description: 有效期单位：day 或 year

is_ca.description: 是否允许使用该证书签发下级证书

platform.description: 系统类型 x86_64, arm64, etc.

max_watch_files.description: inotify 监控的最大文件数
inotify 监控的最大文件数
